request.description:
required info to create a recipe is name, 

required info to create an ingredient is name 

send: 

      "name": "string",  --REQUIRED 

      "mainPhoto": "string", --optional 

      "tagDTOs": --array of TagDTOs but the only field needed is id of existing tag 

          "id": 0  --optional 

      "ingredientDTOs": --array of IngredientDTOs with name(required), amoung, measurement 

          "name": "string", --REQUIRED for creating an ingredient (if you want to add some) 

          "amount": 0, --optional 

          "measurementUnit": "KG", --optional 

      "instructions":  --array. optional 

        "string" 

      "instructionPhotos":  -- array. optional 

        "string" 

      "links": -- array. optional 

        "string" 

response: the whole recipe with all fields filled with data, 0 or null 

      RecipeDTO
          "id": 0, 

          "name": "string", 

          "applicationUserId": 0, --owner 

          "mainPhoto": "string", 

          "tagDTOs":  --array or TagDTOs 

              "id": 0, 

              "name": "string", 

              "icon": "string", 

              "applicationUserId": 0, 

              "recipeIds": [ ]--array of ids of recipes tagged with this tag 

          "ingredientDTOs":  -- array of Ingredient DTOs 

              "id": 0, 

              "name": "string", 

              "amount": 0, 

              "measurementUnit": "KG", 

              "applicationUserId": 0 --must be null in ingredients in recipe 

          "instructions":  --array of strings 

              "string" 

          "instructionPhotos": [ --array of strings 

               "string" 

          "links": [--array of strings 

               "string"

item.name: Get all recipes of current ApplicationUser

request.description:
send: 

response: 

array of RecipeDTO objects with array of TagDTO and array IgredientDTO inside: 

    { 

      "name": "recipe", 

      "mainPhoto": "photoUrl", 

      "tagDTOs": --array of TagDTOs 

                "id": 5, 

                "name": "tag3", 

                "icon": iconUrl, 

                "applicationUserId": 1,  --owner 

                "recipeIds": [] --ids of recipes tagged with this tag 

      "ingredientDTOs": --array of IngredientDTOs 

               "id": 0, 

               "name": "string", 

               "amount": 0, 

               "measurementUnit": "KG", 

               "applicationUserId": null  --owner of ingredient must be null in recipe 

      "instructions": --array of Strings 

                "take a cucumber", 

                "wash", 

                "eat" 

      "instructionPhotos":  --array of Strings 

              "photoUrl" 

      "links": --array of Strings 

                "url" 

    }
